tit.e: Tokan-ya (十日夜: the night on the 10th day of October)
tit.cmt: 用語集ではTokanyaとなっていますが、これだと正確に発音できないと考え、ハイフンを入れました。
tit.e: Tokan-ya (the night on the 10th day of October)
tit.cmt: ”十日夜”を削除しました。色を変更しました。
tit.e: Tokan-ya (the night on the 10th day of October)

sen.j: 十日夜（とおかんや、とおかや）とは、10月10日 (旧暦)の夜に行われる年中行事である。
sen.e: Tokan-ya (also read as Tokaya) is an annual festive events held on the night of October 10 (the lunar calendar).
Tokan-ya (also read as Tokaya) is an annual festive event held on the night of October 10 (old lunar calendar).
sen.cmt: events→event,the lunar calendar→old lunar calender と修正しました。
sen.e: Tokan-ya (also read as Tokaya) is an annual festive event held on the night of October 10 (old lunar calendar).

sen.j: 主に東日本で見られるもので、西日本で旧暦10月の亥の日に行われる亥の子に対応するものである。
sen.e: It is held mainly in eastern Japan, and its equivalent in western Japan is inoko (a baby boar festival) held on the day of Boar in October of the lunar calendar.
It is held mainly in eastern Japan, and it is equivalent to inoko (a baby boar festival) held in western Japan on the day of Boar in October of the old lunar calendar.
sen.cmt: its→it is,in→to,オーダーを修正しました。lunar calender→old lunar calender と修正しました。
sen.e: It is held mainly in eastern Japan, and it is equivalent to inoko (a baby boar festival) held in western Japan on the day of Boar in October of the old lunar calendar.

sen.j: この日は田の神が山に帰る日とされ、子供たちが藁束で地面をたたいて回ったり、案山子上げをしたりする。
sen.e: It is regarded that tanokami (rice field god) returns to the mountain on this day, and the event involves actions such as children walking around beating the ground with a bunch of rice straws and people bringing scarecrows back home to thank them for a year's work (which is called kakashi-age: 案山子上げ).

sen.cmt: (rice field god)→(deity of rice fields and harvests) と修正しました。（用語集登録上）カンマを挿入しました。”案山子上げ”を削除しました。
